actions.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Fowler to the Gejdenson amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the Fowler amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 237, 2 Present (Roll no. 48).

description: Amendment to the Gejdenson amendment (A002) sought to limit the deployment of U.S. Armed Forces and not authorize the President to deploy ground forces to Kosovo as part of a NATO peacekeeping operation.
purpose: An amendment to limit the deployment of U.S. Armed Forces and not authorize the President to deploy ground forces to Kosovo as part of a NATO peacekeeping operation.
